title: NEW RANKING SYSTEM, MOST IMPORTANT CHANGE TO LOL EVER
body:
A win lose system if such a stone age way of looking at things, the world is not flat... its round and can be looked at by many angles.

My Rank should be based on my ability FULL STOP!
ESPECIALLY IN Solo Que your rank should be based on YOUR ABILITY and PERFORMANCE, Not others
Its so easily done!!!!
measure us on 

KDR per game
Leaver%
Assist average per game
Gold average per game
Wards Placed average per game
Ward placed detecting enemy players average per game
Wards Destroyed average per game
Minions Killed average Per game
Neutral Creeps killed per game
Damage to Minions average per game
Damage to Champions average per game
Dragon Kills average per game
Damage to dragon average per game
Barron kills average per game
Damage to Barron average per game
Towers destroyed average per game
Damage to towers average per game
Inhibitors Destroyed average per game
Damage received from towers average per game
Damage received form Champions average per game
Damage received from Neutral Minions average per game
Damage received from Minions average per game
First hit initiation leading to kill average per game 
Healing players average per game
Healing received average per game

I could keep going but i think you get the point. Then all you do is add'em up and you come up with a your rank. 
Obviously things like assists and KDR will have a heavier weigh in. 
But a well placed ward can win a game, why not receive credit for it?
A win lose system if such a stone age way of looking at things, the world is not flat... its round and can be looked at by many angles.


P.s 
Let's get one thing straight first. I've been playing these games allot longer than you ya little punk! I don't care what smart ass troll comment you put on here because you know what kid. I KNOW I'M RIGHT ABOUT THIS. So troll me all you ####### want your opinion mean sweet #### all. 
I'm a fat old #### who has wasted his life playing video games and has gotten no where doing it? What else ya got?

I have been playing these games since Dota.v.1 On War Craft Frozen Throne.
Ive played HON
Ive played Dota 2
Ive been here in LOL since season 1 playing on NA Servers
I have more experience and knowledge of this game than 99% of the people who play it. 
BUT
you wanna know where i am. Bronze 5. I just fell form Silver 2 to Bronze 5 in a matter of days due to one reason. Leavers.
You think i'm joking when i say i get more games with leavers than without in ranked? Well i'm not. making the ranked system a ###### joke to me

A system that does not rate you on your own performance but binds you to others is not only unfair its a #######  joke!

For example, you have just come from the loading screen, the champions appear and then some Mother ####### ##### of #### moves two steps on the summoner platform. types /L and then leaves the game. 
In your ranked system i now find myself not only in a situation i have or had no control over, but now i am some how responsible for it, and now i have to suffer the consequences of this ####### ##### leaving. 
I and the other 3 people lose the game, lose LP, and i get demoted. 

What part of that is fair at ####### all! answer, is nothing about that is fair, if you can find justification in that your a ####### #####

Thinking upon this more....

Instead of a "one line" ranking system.... why not many?

Best Support, Best Adc, Best Fighter, Best Mage, Best Tank, etc etc.

If you can pick your role in "team builder" why not be able to select a role as you pick in SoloQ Ranked Champion selection.

For example .... I'm first pick, I pick Garren....  I select "Top" & "Fighter" as my role. 
That way i'm locked into a Ranking System but even better!!!... My team now know. 
That i plan to go Top and that my play style is "Off Tank Damage" not just "Straight Tank"
or I Pick Leona, Select "Bottom" And "Support Tank"
or I pick Ash, Select "Bottom" and "ADC"

As far as i know there are only so many roles you can play. They are

ADC
Support Tank
Support Mage
Support Fighter
Mid AP
Mid AD
Mid Tank
Mid Fighter
Jungle Ap
Jungle Ad
Jungle Tank
Jungle Fighter
Top Ap
Top Ad
Top Fighter 
Top Tank

( this might also include a Assassin class for each role (except support lol) ) 

And they could all fall under a 5 column rank system
Mid
Support
Adc
Jungle
Top

This would allow for so much more out of LoL
for example.... 

New game, Champion Selection... Some one says "Ranked 4th ADC" ... You check.... They are.... "Let "######" adc i just checked hes good"... People let him adc, and now you have a strong adc.

Also would it be so hard for match making to "try" select .. this persons best role is adc, this persons best role is Tank top, this person best role is jungle etc etc etc and then put them together? I mean of course champ selection rule would still be in effect and you might not always want to jungle but at least this way you have a fighting chance at a team with strengths? instead of an entire team that wants to ADC or MID?

Maybe even when you pick a champion in character selection a small Rank Stat could appear as well, for example
Some one picks 
Eve ... a little window beside her pick or summoner name could display
Games played as Eve
Rank as Jungle or Mid Depending on where she selects

Is says Games Played 0 <- includes normal games
Rank 600,0000th

What I'm saying is those people are dead wrong
I've said it before and ill say it again

Any ranked system that punishes you for the actions of another player or any element you have NO CONTROL over is not only unfair, but makes any competitive aspect irrelevant.

Its the simple fact that its says "solo que" not "team que" In solo que you should be ranked on your own individual performance and not held accountable for leavers/afks, troll and feeders and the likes.

People bragging about what rank they are is a joke, the only reason your there and i'm here is luck. pure and simple.
Luck that you didn't have 95% leavers in your games.
Luck that every time you get a promo you didn't get a troll or leaver

Yes obviously skill level is involved don't get me wrong, but you cant deny the fact that the above factors could and can contribute to someones ranking experience. As such different levels of these factors can and do occur.
Some people will get more leavers in their games, some less.
